mode.info: You can run your device in AP Mode or Client Mode. In client mode you will need to connect to an existing Wi-Fi network, in AP Mode ESP creates a Wi-Fi network by itself.
mode.label: Mode

bssid.info: Select the BSSID to use explicit node (optional).
bssid.label: BSSID

hide.info: Hide the SSID of the access point.
hide.label: Hide SSID

dhcp.info: Use DHCP or static ip addresses.
dhcp.label: Use DHCP

ip.info: Set the static IP address of this node.
ip.label: IP Address

subnet.info: Set the subnet mask to be used.
subnet.label: Subnet mask

gw.info: Address of the Gateway to the world.
gw.label: Gatway

fallback.info: Fallback to Access Point Mode when WiFi Network could not be joined.
fallback.label: Fallback
